info.title: Format
info.description: Easily format data, and information through our platform agnostic api. Allows formatting of various information types such as: Phone Numbers to National, International, and E164 Format and returns type of number; Dates to a large multitude of formats with validation, UTC, time ago; Currency and Numeric formatting based on country codes or default US setting, and Names Normalization / Formatting.

get.description: Format currency amounts in multiple locales, default en-US

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country codes, there are a lot supported, full list coming soon. Popular: cy, da, de, en-US, en-GB, en-CA, el, es, fr, ga, gd, gl, gu, ha, he, hu, is, it, km, ko, kok, ky, kl, ka, ja, iu, ro, ru, se, tr, vi, wo, yi, zh

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value to be formatted as currency

get.description: Name normalization / formatting. Currently only English, and Japanese honorifics are supported, more coming soon.
